name: linktop
description: SDK completo per integrare dispositivi LINKTOP 6-in-1 Health Monitor, Digital Stethoscope e Digital Otoscope in applicazioni Next.js.

scripts.tunnel: ssh -f -N -L 5433:localhost:5432 -i ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 root@91.99.141.225 || echo 'Tunnel giÃ  attivo o errore connessione'
scripts.tunnel:check: lsof -i :5433 | grep LISTEN || echo 'Tunnel NON attivo'
scripts.tunnel:kill: lsof -ti :5433 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; pkill -f 'ssh -f -N -L 5433' 2>/dev/null && echo 'Tutti i tunnel chiusi' || echo 'Nessun tunnel attivo'
